intent_atoms.description: Integrate FoundationUI dependency into the project and ensure it builds successfully.
FoundationUI dependency is integrated and building without errors.
All integration tests must pass (123 tests) with ≥80% test coverage.
Create a comprehensive integration test suite for FoundationUI components.
Integration test suite contains 123 tests covering Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, and Integration components.
Zero SwiftLint violations in the project.
Build a component showcase using ComponentTestApp to display live FoundationUI components.
ComponentTestApp provides at least 14 screens showcasing components.
Document integration patterns for FoundationUI in technical spec.
Update the Design System Guide with migration roadmap.
Design System Guide updated with ~800 lines added.
Accessibility compliance ≥98% WCAG 2.1 AA for all components.

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Dependency Integration
functional_units.description: Integrates FoundationUI library into the project and ensures successful build.

functional_units.name: Integration Test Suite for FoundationUI
functional_units.description: Runs comprehensive tests covering Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, and Integration components to validate integration.

functional_units.name: Component Showcase Application
functional_units.description: Live demo app displaying all FoundationUI components across multiple screens.

functional_units.name: Documentation of Integration Patterns
functional_units.description: Technical documentation outlining how to integrate FoundationUI components into the system.

functional_units.name: Design System Guide Update
functional_units.description: Updates design system guide with migration roadmap and guidelines for using FoundationUI.

functional_units.name: Badge & Status Indicator Component
functional_units.description: Provides Badge UI component (DS.Badge) for displaying corruption, severity, and parse state indicators.

functional_units.name: Card Container Component
functional_units.description: Wrapper around DS.Card providing BoxDetailsCard functionality and layout.

functional_units.name: Key‑Value Row Component
functional_units.description: Custom wrapper for DS.KeyValueRow — i.e., BoxMetadataRow.

functional_units.name: User Settings Panel Shell
functional_units.description: Floating settings panel UI that displays …
